params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

configureReserveAsCollateral(address,uin.details: Configures the reserve collateralization parameters all the values are expressed in percentages with two decimals of precision. A valid value is 10000, which means 100.00%

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve
params.liquidationBonus: The bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset. The values is always above 100%. A value of 105% means the liquidator will receive a 5% bonus*
params.liquidationThreshold: The threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized
params.ltv: The loan to value of the asset when used as collateral

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*
The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

disableReserveStableRate(address).details: Disable stable rate borrowing on a reserve

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*
The address of the underlying asset of the reserve
params.stableBorrowRateEnabled: True if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled by default on this reserve*

enableReserveStableRate(address).details: Enable stable rate borrowing on a reserve

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

freezeReserve(address).details: Freezes a reserve. A frozen reserve doesn't allow any new deposit, borrow or rate swap  but allows repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and withdrawals

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

params.aTokenImpl: The address of the aToken contract implementation
params.interestRateStrategyAddress: The address of the interest rate strategy contract for this reserve*
params.stableDebtTokenImpl: The address of the stable debt token contract
params.underlyingAssetDecimals: The decimals of the reserve underlying asset
params.variableDebtTokenImpl: The address of the variable debt token contract

setPoolPause(bool).details: pauses or unpauses all the actions of the protocol, including aToken transfers

params.val: true if protocol needs to be paused, false otherwise*

setReserveFactor(address,uint256).details: Updates the reserve factor of a reserve

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve
params.reserveFactor: The new reserve factor of the reserve*

setReserveInterestRateStrategyAddress(ad.details: Sets the interest rate strategy of a reserve

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve
params.rateStrategyAddress: The new address of the interest strategy contract*

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

updateAToken(address,address).details: Updates the aToken implementation for the reserve

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve to be updated
params.implementation: The address of the new aToken implementation*

updateStableDebtToken(address,address).details: Updates the stable debt token implementation for the reserve

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve to be updated
params.implementation: The address of the new aToken implementation*

updateVariableDebtToken(address,address).details: Updates the variable debt token implementation for the asset

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve to be updated
params.implementation: The address of the new aToken implementation*

documentation.text:
@title Errors library
 @author Aave
 @notice Defines the error messages emitted by the different contracts of the Aave protocol
 @dev Error messages prefix glossary:
  - VL = ValidationLogic
  - MATH = Math libraries
  - CT = Common errors between tokens (AToken, VariableDebtToken and StableDebtToken)
  - AT = AToken
  - SDT = StableDebtToken
  - VDT = VariableDebtToken
  - LP = LendingPool
  - LPAPR = LendingPoolAddressesProviderRegistry
  - LPC = LendingPoolConfiguration
  - RL = ReserveLogic
  - LPCM = LendingPoolCollateralManager
  - P = Pausable
@dev Emitted when the pause is triggered.
@dev Emitted when the pause is lifted.

@dev Emitted when borrowing is disabled on a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Emitted when stable rate borrowing is enabled on a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Emitted when stable rate borrowing is disabled on a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Emitted when a reserve is activated
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Emitted when a reserve is deactivated
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Emitted when a reserve is frozen
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Emitted when a reserve is unfrozen
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Disables borrowing on a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Enable stable rate borrowing on a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Disable stable rate borrowing on a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Activates a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Deactivates a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev Unfreezes a reserve
 @param asset The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*

@dev pauses or unpauses all the actions of the protocol, including aToken transfers
 @param val true if protocol needs to be paused, false otherwise*
@notice Returns the WETH address (reference asset of the oracle)

@notice Gets an asset price by address
 @param asset The asset address

@notice Gets a list of prices from a list of assets addresses
 @param assets The list of assets addresses

@notice Gets the address of the fallback oracle
 @return address The address of the fallback oracle
@dev returns the market borrow rate in ray*
@dev sets the market borrow rate. Rate value must be in ray*

@dev Returns the nonce of the given user.
 @param user The user to fetch the nonce for.
@dev Returns the address of the incentives controller contract*
@dev Returns the address of the underlying asset of this aToken (E.g. WETH for aWETH)*
@dev for backward compatibility with previous implementation of the Incentives controller
